FuncDef:
The client source-interface command binds a source interface to an HTTP client.
The undo client source-interface command unbinds the source interface from an HTTP client. The client source-interface command binds a source interface to an HTTP client. The undo client source-interface command unbinds the source interface from an HTTP client. By default, an HTTP client source is selected by the app or sock.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a source interface of an HTTP client.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the type of a source interface of an HTTP client.
-

Specifies the number of a source interface of an HTTP client.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: To improve system security, you can specify the source interface of the HTTP client and use the bound source interface address to establish a connection.
